title: com.apple.Safari.PluginsExtensions
description: Extensions and Plug-ins Preferences for the Safari Web Browser

ExtensionsEnabled.title: Enable Extensions
ExtensionsEnabled.description: Enables or disables the use of Extensions

InstallExtensionUpdatesAutomatically.title: Install Extension Updates Automatically
InstallExtensionUpdatesAutomatically.description: Sets whether extension updates are installed automatically

SkipLoadingEnabledAppExtensionsAtLaunch.title: Skip Loading of Enabled App Extensions at Launch
SkipLoadingEnabledAppExtensionsAtLaunch.description: Sets whether to skip the loading of enabled extensions at launch

SkipLoadingEnabledContentBlockersAtLaunc.title: Skip Loading of Enabled Content Blockers at Launch
SkipLoadingEnabledContentBlockersAtLaunc.description: Sets whether to skip the loading of enabled content blockers at launch

SkipLoadingExtensionsAtLaunch.title: Skip Loading Extensions at Launch
SkipLoadingExtensionsAtLaunch.description: Sets whether to skip the loading of extensions at launch

WebKitPreferences.asynchronousPluginInit.title: Enable asynchronous plugin initialization
WebKitPreferences.asynchronousPluginInit.description: Sets whether to enable asynchronous initialization of plugins
